commandhandler.error.nopermission: You have no Permission to use the Command: **${cmd}**. You need the Permission Level: **${requiredlevel}** or above. Your Permission Level is: **${userlevel}**
commandhandler.error.dm: This Command can only be used on Guilds
commandhandler.warn.cooldown: You need to wait ${timeleft} Seconds bevor you can use the command: ${cmdname} again
commandhandler.error.failed: An Error occured than executing the Command
commandhandler.error.notnsfw: The command: **${cmd}** can **only** be used in NSFW Channels
cmds.info.help.description: Shows you all Categories and Commands
cmds.info.help.usage:
[Command] - Shows you information of a command
[Categorie] - Shows you all Commands from a Categorie
cmds.info.help.all.title: All commands:
cmds.info.help.all.description: The Bot has **${cmdscount}** commands and **${categoriescount}** categories
cmds.info.help.cmds.dm: Can also be used in DMs:
cmds.info.help.categories.title: Nothing found
cmds.info.help.categories.description: Couldn't find a categorie or a command for: **${args[0]}**
cmds.info.help.cmds.nsfw: Can only be used in NSFW Channels
